alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 9:53AM MST until January 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, the Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Feet and western Las Animas County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft
